channel.title: CVE Feed for Jenkins project -- Jenkins Pipeline Remote Loader Plugin
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Jenkins project -- Jenkins Pipeline Remote Loader Plugin

item.title: CVE-2019-10328|2024-08-04T22:17:20.492Z -- jenkins%20project -- jenkins%20pipeline%20remote%20loader%20plugin
item.description: Jenkins Pipeline Remote Loader Plugin 1.4 and earlier provided a custom whitelist for script security that allowed attackers to invoke arbitrary methods, bypassing typical sandbox protection.
